Text:
Classification: Reality
Genre: Financial/Business | Lifestyle
Status: Returning Series
Network: BBC TWO ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Tuesdays at 08:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: January 31, 2012
Episode Order: 6

Alex Polizzi - The Fixer sees entrepreneur Alex Polizzi attempting to help different family firms that have reached breaking point. She looks at both their financial failures and domestic dramas and attempts to help make them successful again.
